externalId.description: Unique freight id in source system

externalShipmentId.description: Unique shipment id in source system

reference.description: The Swipref, a unique id in Swipload

shipmentReference.description: Shipment reference, a unique id in Swipload

shippersReference.description: Literal reference id shown in system and invoice.

errorMessage.description: Error message if the upload failed, null on success

items.description: Result of a Base64 document upload operation
items.title: DocumentBase64ResultDto

documentBase64Results.description: Results of any document uploads included with the freight

schema.description: Response returned after creating or updating a freight
schema.title: FreightPostResponse
